prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of James J. Kilpatrick, 1925-1966, Accession #6626, 6626-a, 6626-b, 6626-c, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Library acquired these papers from James J. Kilpatrick, 14 Dec 1967.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of James J. Kilpatrick consist of speeches, 1951-1966; miscellaneous newspaper and magazine articles, 1947-1966; miscellaneous notes and manscripts on books; personal invitations, 1966; material dealing generally with the Doctrine of Interposition; material dealing with radio-television appearances, 1962-1967; and papers on Senator Harry F. Byrd, Sr., 1925-1964.
